Text: This is literally the worst game ever.
Its not the worst game ever because a site or two wrote that it is. It's bad, yes, but not the worst and it is definitely worth acquiring, even only for it's obscure and cult status.

Yeah, no, it's the worst game EVER! The reason you only found a few sites with negative reviews is because most sites didn't have review scores that went down low enough! This game has the worst meta-critic rating of all-time! To say it's not bad is just foolish and naive`...
